mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORKSPACE(workspaceId, workspaceName, createdAt, description) VALUES(workspaceid_seq.NEXTVAL,#{workspaceName},SYSDATE,#{description})
mapper.select: SELECT workspaceId, workspaceName, createdAt, description FROM OTREEUSER_WORKSPACE OW JOIN WORKSPACE W ON w.workspaceId = w.workspaceId WHERE ow.userId = #{userId}
SELECT workspaceId, workspaceName, createdAt, description FROM WORKSPACE WHERE workspaceId = #{workspaceId}
